[[File:MusicFlag.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
[[Discordance]] is a skill used by bards and requires [[Musicianship]] for successful attempts. Your music produces a clashing sound that weakens strong creatures. If successful, your target will lose a percentage of its [[Skills]] and [[Stats]. The percentage lost is dependent on your [[Discordance]] skill. For instance, at 50.0 skill, the target loses 10% from all [[Stats]] and [[Skills]]; and at 100.0 skill the target loses 20% from all [[Stats]] and [[Skills]]. Once the effect wears off, the target's skill and stats will return to normal. (Does not affect player characters.)

==Range==
The range of all bard [[Skills]] is 8 tiles, each 15 points in the skill increases the range by a single tile. Bards have to be within the range of the target to use the ability on it or it will fail. Bards must remain within their range or the effects of the skill will wear off.

:50 - 100: Use Discordance on Creatures
